bwwExcerpt: While this version may not be considered "immersive" like its off-Broadway predecessor, the production pulls out every stop to near the experiential nature previous audiences fell in love with. Unassuming sleek scenic design (Gabriel Hainer Evansohn) and active, physical, direction (Teddy Bergman) make smart use of the space, including every inch of aisle, platform, and trap door available.
